description.narrative:
Oxfam Program ID PROG10131
Work under this Impact Goal will focus on building the capacity of the government departments that are in charge of anticipating and responding to emergencies and other local agencies includinglocal civil society organisationsand ensuring that responses are in line with international humanitarian standards.
This also includes building the capacity of communities in risk mapping and management, raising community awareness on their rights in emergencies.
To influence humanitarian laws and policies and to ensure pooling of resources Oxfam in Mozambique works in a network of international organisations (COSACA). With this network as the platform for engagement Oxfam will contribute to capacity building for the national humanitarian Forum (LNGOs)
